messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE REPORT: #R-4567-ML DATE: 05/15/36  There has been a series of cyberattacks targeting local businesses in Hilltown. These attacks have caused severe disruptions, leading to significant financial losses.  LAW ENFORCEMENT ENGAGEMENT:  CYBERSECURITY LEAD: Detective P. Q. R. Masterson, a seasoned cybersecurity expert, is diving into the digital traces of the attacks. FORENSIC TECHNICIAN: Detective S. T. U. Knight is analyzing the malware used in the attacks to trace its origin. FIELD INVESTIGATOR: Captain V. W. X. Clarke is interviewing the affected business owners and collecting CCTV footage from nearby locations. PATROL OFFICER: Patrol Officer Y. Z. Adams responded to the initial distress calls and collected preliminary reports. The cyberattacks have alarmed the Hilltown community, and there's a significant push for enhanced digital security measures.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Detective P. Q. R. Masterson  
Officer Context: Detective Masterson specializes in cybersecurity and is analyzing the digital aspect of the attacks.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective S. T. U. Knight  
Officer Context: Detective Knight is studying the malware's origin.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Captain V. W. X. Clarke  
Officer Context: Captain Clarke is collecting reports and interviewing the affected business owners.  
Officer Role: Captain 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer Y. Z. Adams  
Officer Context: Patrol Officer Adams took the initial reports when the attacks occurred.  
Officer Role: Patrol Officer
